text: 1. 2/7/2025 | H | The committee(s) on ECD recommend(s) that the measure be deferred.
2. 2/4/2025 | H | Bill scheduled to be heard by ECD on Friday, 02-07-25 10:15AM in House conference room 423 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

3. 2/4/2025 | H | Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on ECD with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Cochran, Kong, Ward excused (3).
4. 2/4/2025 | H | Reported from HSH (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 59) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to ECD.

5. 1/30/2025 | H | The committee on HSH recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Marten, Olds, Amato, Chun, Keohokapu-Lee Loy, Takayama, Takenouchi, Alcos, Garcia; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and  Excused: none.
6. 1/27/2025 | H | Bill scheduled to be heard by HSH on Thursday, 01-30-25 9:35AM in House conference room 329 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.
7. 1/23/2025 | H | Referred to HSH, ECD, FIN, referral sheet 3
8. 1/23/2025 | H | Introduced and Pass First Reading.
